name: Boban Vegan
description:
Objective:

  • Try to evade obstacles and all animals.
  • Help Boban eat all bananas before the finish.
  • Hurry up, time is limited for each level.

Controls:

  • A/D or left arrow/right arrow to move left/right
  • Space to jump

Game currently has 3 levels. If you like the game please consider supporting it and you can expect more levels and possibly survival mode added, so you can try to beat the best score.

Please let me know your thoughts about the game and what would you like to see more.
